00020         return std::string( "flist" );

00022 public:
00023     std::string dialects( const std::string &/*filename*/ )const {
00024 
00025         std::list<util::istring> suffixes;
00026         BOOST_FOREACH( data::IOFactory::FileFormatPtr format, data::IOFactory::getFormats() ) {
00027             const std::list<util::istring> s = format->getSuffixes();
00028             suffixes.insert( suffixes.end(), s.begin(), s.end() );
00029         }
00030         suffixes.sort();
00031         suffixes.unique();
00032 
00033         return std::string( util::listToString( suffixes.begin(), suffixes.end(), " ", "", "" ) );
00034     }
00035     std::string getName()const {return "filelist proxy (gets filenames from files or stdin)";}
00036 
00037     size_t doLoad( std::istream &in, std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &dialect ) {
00038         size_t red = 0;
00039         const boost::regex linebreak( "[[.newline.][.carriage-return.]]" );
00040         std::string fnames;
00041 
00042         while( !in.eof() ) {
00043             in >> fnames ;
00044             BOOST_FOREACH( const std::string fname, util::stringToList<std::string>( fnames, linebreak ) ) {
00045                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "loading " << fname;
00046                 red += data::IOFactory::load( chunks, fname, "", dialect );
00047             }
00048         }
00049 
00050         return red;
00051     }
00052 
00053     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00054         if( filename.empty() ) {
00055             LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Getting filelist from stdin";
00056             return doLoad( std::cin, chunks, dialect );
00057         } else {
00058             LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Getting filelist from " << filename;
00059             std::ifstream in( filename.c_str() );
00060             in.exceptions( std::ios::badbit );
00061             return doLoad( in, chunks, dialect );
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     void write( const data::Image &/*image*/, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00066         throw( std::runtime_error( "not yet implemented" ) );
00067     }
00068     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00069 };
